extensionDescription.message: Поиск, отображение и удаление дублей закладок, пустых папок, описаний

checkboxRules.message: Expert mode: use customized rules to match similar bookmarks or to ignore bookmarks when searching.
checkboxRules.description: Checkbox text for switching on/off regexp rules

titleCheckboxRules.message: With this option bookmarks can be ignored or similar bookmarks can be found. The details are specified in terms of regular expressions.
titleCheckboxRules.description: Explain what regular expresssions are used for

radioFilter.description: Radio button for filtering a bookmark. The text should be short

titleRadioFilter.message: Bookmarks matching the criteria will be ignored.
titleRadioFilter.description: Explain that by choosing that button the corresponding bookmark will be ignored

radioUrl.description: Radio button for preprocessing a URL. The text should be short

titleRadioUrl.message: Before checking URLs to find bookmark dupes, the URL of matching bookmarks will be preprocessed according to the specified rule.
titleRadioUrl.description: Explain that by choosing that button the url of matching bookmarks will be preprocessed

radioOff.description: Radio button for ignoring the rule. The text should be short

titleRadioOff.description: Explain that by choosing that button the rule has no effect

ruleName.description: Input field for matching the name. The text should be short

titleRuleName.message: The rule applies to a bookmark if the bookmark path (folders + name) matches the regular expression. The separator for folders is \0 or \x00.
titleRuleName.description: Explain that bookmarks whose name matches the regular expression will be selected and that folders names are separated by \0 or \x00

ruleNameNegation.description: Input field for not matching the name. The text should be short

titleRuleNameNegation.message: The rule applies to a bookmark if the bookmark path (folders + name) does not match the regular expression. The separator for folders is \0 or \x00.
titleRuleNameNegation.description: Explain that bookmarks whose names does not match the regular expression will be selected and that folders names are separated by \0 or \x00

ruleUrl.description: Input field for matching the URL. The text should be short

titleRuleUrl.message: The rule applies to a bookmark if its URL matches the regular expression.
titleRuleUrl.description: Explain that bookmarks whose URL matches the regular expression will be selected

ruleUrlNegation.description: Input field for matching the URL. The text should be short

titleRuleUrlNegation.message: The rule applies to a bookmark if its URL does not match the regular expression.
titleRuleUrlNegation.description: Explain that bookmarks whose URL does not match the regular expression will be selected

ruleSearch.description: Input field for the search part of the URL. The text should be short

titleRuleSearch.message: When comparing URLs the parts matching the regular expression will be replaced by the subsequent text.
titleRuleSearch.description: Explain that the corresponding parts of the URL will be replaced for comparison

ruleReplace.description: Input field for the replacement text for the regular expression matches. The text should be short

titleRuleReplace.message: The replacement text for the regular expresssion matches. Symbols like $$& or $$1 can be used to refer to the match or a brace content. The special texts \L$$& and \U$$& mean a lower and upper case version of the matches, respectively.
titleRuleReplace.description: Explain that the text will be used as replacement text for the regular expression matches

buttonRuleUp.description: Button for moving a rule up. The text should be short

titleButtonRuleUp.message: The rule will be moved up.
titleButtonRuleUp.description: Explain that the rule will be moved up

buttonRuleDown.description: Button for moving a rule down. The text should be short

titleButtonRuleDown.message: The rule will be moved down.
titleButtonRuleDown.description: Explain that the rule will be moved down

buttonRuleSub.description: Button for removing a rule. The text should be short

titleButtonRuleSub.description: Explain that the rule will be removed

buttonRuleAdd.description: Button for inserting a new rule. The text should be short

titleButtonRuleAdd.description: Explain that a new rule will be inserted

regExpFrequent.description: A regular expression for folder names which intentionally might contain duplicate bookmarks (e.g. "Frequently used"). The expression is enclosed into \0(...)\0

buttonRulesDefault.description: Button for restoring default rules. The text should be short

titleButtonRulesDefault.message: Restore the default rules. Any changes will be lost
titleButtonRulesDefault.description: Explain that default rules will be restored

buttonRulesStore.description: Button for putting current rules to local storage. The text should be short

titleButtonRulesStore.message: The current rules will be put to the browser's local storage area.
titleButtonRulesStore.description: Explain that current rules will be put to local storage

buttonRulesRestore.description: Button for fetching rules from local storage. The text should be short

titleButtonRulesRestore.message: The rules will be replaced by those stored in the browser's local storage area. Any changes will be lost.
titleButtonRulesRestore.description: Explain that rules will be fetched from local storage

buttonRulesClean.description: Button for cleaning local storage from stored rules. The text should be short

titleButtonRulesClean.message: The browser's local storage area will be cleaned from stored rules. The stored rules will be lost.
titleButtonRulesClean.description: Explain that the local storage will be cleaned from stored rules

titleButtonListDupes.message: (Re)calculate the list of bookmark dupes. Two bookmarks are considered to be dupes if their URLs coincide. In expert mode, the selected URL preprocessing (substitution) rules are applied before the URLs are compared.
(Re)calculate the list of exact bookmark dupes. Two bookmarks are considered to be exact dupes if their URLs are identical.
(Пере)определить список точных дублей. Закладки считаются точными дублями, если их URL-ы идентичны.
titleButtonListDupes.description: Explain that the list of bookmark dupes will be (re)calculated, and how bookmark dupes are defined

titleButtonListEmpty.message: (Пере)определить список пустых папок. Результат может ошибочно содержать Живые закладки (RSS).
titleButtonListEmpty.description: Explain that the list of empty folders will be (re)calculated, and that the result might falsely contain live bookmarks

titleButtonListAll.message: (Пере)определить список всех закладок для очистки описания. Список состоит из закладок с заполненным URL-адресом.
titleButtonListAll.description: Explain that the list of all bookmarks will be (re)calculated for stripping descriptions and that it consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL

buttonMarkButFirst.message: В каждой группе выбрать все кроме верхней
buttonMarkButFirst.description: Button for marking all but first

titleButtonMarkButFirst.message: В каждой группе дублей будут выбраны все закладки кроме верхней.
titleButtonMarkButFirst.description: Explain that additionally the first bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButLast.message: В каждой группе выбрать все кроме нижней
buttonMarkButLast.description: Button for marking all but last

titleButtonMarkButLast.message: В каждой группе дублей будут выбраны все закладки кроме нижней.
titleButtonMarkButLast.description: Explain that additionally the last bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButOldest.message: В каждой группе выбрать все кроме старейшей
buttonMarkButOldest.description: Button for marking all but oldest

titleButtonMarkButOldest.message: В каждой группе дублей будут выбраны все закладки кроме старейшей.
titleButtonMarkButOldest.description: Explain that additionally the oldest bookmark in each group will be unmarked

buttonMarkButNewest.message: В каждой группе выбрать все кроме новейшей
buttonMarkButNewest.description: Button for marking all but newest

titleButtonMarkButNewest.message: В каждой группе дублей будут выбраны все закладки кроме новейшей.
titleButtonMarkButNewest.description: Explain that additionally the newest bookmark in each group will be unmarked

titleButtonMarkAll.description: Explain that all bookmarks will be marked

titleButtonUnmarkAll.description: Explain that all bookmarks will be unmarked

optionNonFolder.message: -- Выберите папку чтобы увидеть кнопки маркировки её закладок --
optionNonFolder.description: Name of the non-folder. It might indicate that buttons for markings appear if another name is selected.

optionSameFolder.description: Name of a special folder selection: Identical folders in the same group

titleSelectFolder.message: Если папка выбрана, отображаются кнопки для маркировки её закладок.
titleSelectFolder.description: Explain that selecting a folder will provide corresponding buttons for marking

buttonMarkFolder.description: Button for marking all of the selected folder

titleButtonMarkFolder.message: Отметить все закладки из выбраной папки.
titleButtonMarkFolder.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be marked

buttonUnmarkFolder.message: Снять отметку со всех из выбраной папки
buttonUnmarkFolder.description: Button for unmarking all of selected folder

titleButtonUnmarkFolder.message: Снять отметку со всех закладок из выбраной папки.
titleButtonUnmarkFolder.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be unmarked

buttonMarkFolderOther.message: Где есть закладки из выбраной папки - выбрать всё кроме них.
buttonMarkFolderOther.description: Button for marking all but selected folder in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderOther.message: В группах дублей где есть закладки из выбраной папки будет выбрано всё, кроме них.
titleButtonMarkFolderOther.description: Explain that all bookmarks of selected folder will be unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButFirst.message: Где есть закладки из выбраной папки - отметить только их (или искл. верхнюю)
buttonMarkFolderButFirst.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or first in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButFirst.message: В группах дублей, где есть закладки из выбраной папки, будут выбраны только они (или исключена верхняя, если других нет).
titleButtonMarkFolderButFirst.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the first is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButLast.message: Где есть закладки из выбраной папки - отметить только их (или искл. нижнюю)
buttonMarkFolderButLast.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or last in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButLast.message: В группах дублей, где есть закладки из выбраной папки, будут выбраны только они (или исключена нижняя, если других нет).
titleButtonMarkFolderButLast.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the last is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButOldest.message: Где есть закладки из выбраной папки - отметить только их (или искл. старейшую)
buttonMarkFolderButOldest.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or oldest in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButOldest.message: В группах дублей, где есть закладки из выбраной папки, будут выбраны только они (или исключена старейшая, если других нет).
titleButtonMarkFolderButOldest.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the oldest is unmarked

buttonMarkFolderButNewest.message: Где есть закладки из выбраной папки - отметить только их (или искл. новейшую)
buttonMarkFolderButNewest.description: Button for unmarking all but selected folder or newest in groups with it

titleButtonMarkFolderButNewest.message: В группах дублей, где есть закладки из выбраной папки, будут выбраны только они (или исключена новейшая, если других нет).
titleButtonMarkFolderButNewest.description: Explain that in groups with selected folder all bookmarks from that folder will be marked and all others unmarked; if there are no others, the newest is unmarked

buttonMarkSame.message: Отметить все идентичные папки в одной группе
buttonMarkSame.description: Button for marking all of the same folders in the same group

titleButtonMarkSame.message: Отметить все закладки из идентичных папок в одной группе
titleButtonMarkSame.description: Explain that all bookmarks of identical folders in the same group will be marked

buttonUnmarkSame.message: Снять отметку со всех идентичных папок в одной группе
buttonUnmarkSame.description: Button for unmarking all of the same folders in the same group

titleButtonUnmarkSame.message: Снять отметку со всех закладок из идентичных папок в одной группе.
titleButtonUnmarkSame.description: Explain that all bookmarks of identical folders in the same group will be unmarked

buttonMarkSameButFirst.message: Отметить все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме верхних
buttonMarkSameButFirst.description: Button for marking all but the first of identical folders in the same group

titleButtonMarkSameButFirst.message: Будут отмечены все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме самых верхних.
titleButtonMarkSameButFirst.description: Explain that additionally for identical folders in the same group the first will be unmarked

buttonMarkSameButLast.message: Отметить все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме нижних
buttonMarkSameButLast.description: Button for marking all but the last of identical folders in the same group

titleButtonMarkSameButLast.message: Будут отмечены все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме самых нижних.
titleButtonMarkSameButLast.description: Explain that additionally for identical folders in the same group the last will be unmarked

buttonMarkSameButOldest.message: Отметить все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме старейших
buttonMarkSameButOldest.description: Button for marking all but the oldest of identical folders in the same group

titleButtonMarkSameButOldest.message: Будут отмечены все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме самых старых.
titleButtonMarkSameButOldest.description: Explain that additionally for identical folders in the same group the oldest will be unmarked

buttonMarkSameButNewest.message: Отметить все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме новейших
buttonMarkSameButNewest.description: Button for marking all but the newest of identical folders in the same group

titleButtonMarkSameButNewest.message: Будут отмечены все идентичные папки в одной группе, кроме самых новых.
titleButtonMarkSameButNewest.description: Explain that additionally for identical folders in the same group the newest will be unmarked

titleButtonRemoveMarked.message: Закладки отмечены с тех пор, как вы в последний раз нажимали кнопку, вычисляя список.
titleButtonRemoveMarked.description: Explain that bookmarks refer to those of last update of the list

buttonStripMarked.description: Button for stripping descriptions of marked bookmarks

titleButtonStripMarked.message: Очистка описания обновит дату создания закладки. Кроме того, это возвратит закладку в то место, где она была, когда вы в последний раз нажимали кнопку, вычисляя этот список.
titleButtonStripMarked.description: Explain the side effects that stripping updates the date of bookmarks and moves them to the location of the last calculation of the list

buttonStopRemoving.description: Button for emergency stop of bookmark removing

buttonStopStripping.description: Button for emergency stop of description stripping

checkboxFullUrl.message: Показывать URL-ы в списке. В любом случае URL-адрес появится, если вы наведете курсор на закладку.
checkboxFullUrl.description: Checkbox for displaying URL in listing. Explain that the URL will appear as title anyway

checkboxExtra.message: Display replaced URL content in listing
Отображать концовку URL-адреса (всё после “?”) в списке
checkboxExtra.description: Checkbox for displaying the replaced URL content in listing

messageCount.description: Report specified number of marked bookmarks

messageNoCount.message: Для ускорения аддона число отмеченных закладок не отображается
messageNoCount.description: Report that marks are not counted for speed reasons

messageMatches.description: Report specified numbers of matches and groups of all

titleMessageMatches.message: Two bookmarks are considered to be dupes if their URLs coincide. In expert mode, the selected URL preprocessing (substitution) rules are applied before the URLs are compared.
Two bookmarks are considered to be exact dupes if their URLs are identical.
Две закладки считаются точными дублями, если их URL-ы одинаковы.
titleMessageMatches.description: Explain how bookmark dupes are defined

messageEmpty.description: Report specified number of empty folders

titleMessageEmpty.message: Этот список может ошибочно содержать Живые закладки (RSS).
titleMessageEmpty.description: Explain that the list might falsely contain live bookmarks

titleMessageAll.message: Список состоит из закладок с заполненным URL-адресом.
titleMessageAll.description: Explain that the list consists of those bookmarks with a nonempty URL

messageRemoveMarked.description: Report that removal of marked bookmarks started

messageRemoveProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of bookmarks are removed

messageRemoveSuccess.description: Report success when removing specified number of bookmarks

messageRemoveError.description: Report specified error after removing specified number of bookmarks

messageStripProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of descriptions are stripped

messageStripSuccess.description: Report success when stripping specified number of descriptions

messageStripError.description: Report specified error after stripping specified number of descriptions
